title: Bowen Yang
description:
In this episode Ellen sits down with actor, comedien, and SNL writer and cast member Bowen Yang. They discuss how Grey's Anatomy inspired Bowen's acting career, conversion therapy, and why representation in comedy is so important. 

 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
